name: NSPortMessage
desc: A low-level, operating system-independent type for inter-application (and inter-thread) messages.

items.name: - initWithSendPort:receivePort:components:
items.desc: Initializes a newly allocated NSPortMessage object to send given data on a given port and to receiver replies on another given port.

items.name: - sendBeforeDate:
items.desc: Attempts to send the message before aDate, returning YES if successful or NO if the operation times out.
